name: Private Speed Boat Charters
description:
Have you ever gone on a Chartered Speed Boat Adventure? Then, what could be any better than having your own captained, Private Speed Boat with all accommodations, enjoying Jamaica’s North Coast? We offer the safest and best customer service in the Water Sports business.

We ensure that all the equipment are used in a safe manner and only in designated areas. The tour takes you anywhere you choose around Montego Bay. Enjoy the world famous Margaritaville, the world re-known Doctor’s Cave Beach, Snorkelling in the Marine Park, site seeing in the Lagoon’s Bird Sanctuary or even customize your own private adventure
